alert.note: Alert for Ford; Iroquois (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 12 at 2:16PM CST until January 13 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Low visibility due to falling snow and strong westerly winds expected. Snow accumulations up to 1 inch and wind gusts in excess of 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Iroquois and Ford Counties. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to noon CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on hazardous travel conditions with areas of blowing snow especially in open and rural areas. In addition, gusty winds may bring down tree limbs.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com.
